features.name: App for players and admins
features.description: AirsoftApp makes events easier for Organizers and more fun for players. The app gives airsoft players a way to call out enemies or put tactics on the map without the enemies knowing.

features.name: Real time user tracking
features.description: The application uses background GPS tracking so you and your team mates can see you on the map all the time. Organizers can see where the players are in real time, which makes it easier to organize the event and keep track of everything.

features.name: Automatic point counting
features.description: In Domination game mode, players standing in the objectives acquire points which are automatically counted and you always know who the winner is. No more keeping track of who is winning and by how much. Everything is available with the app.

features.name: Event Replays
features.description: Every event is recorded in our system, and you can check the eventâ€™s replay inside the AirsoftApp to check what happened in the game. Players can access replays too. We also have an easy to use replay downloader, so you can share it on your social media.

battleroyale.name: Quickly create a game
battleroyale.description: Everything is done in the mobile app. Define the boundaries and set the game time. Start the game and let the Battleroyale adventure begin.

battleroyale.name: No fuss with complex settings
battleroyale.description: Setting up a game takes about 5 minutes. You can do it right in the field. No need to prepare in advance.

battleroyale.name: Familiar to other Battleroyale games
battleroyale.description: Ever dreamt about playing PUBG or Fortnite in real life? Now you can! The game is designed to be familiar to other Battleroyale games.
